distractors.description: Create a var to hold the message.
Store the "Hello World!" in the message var.

comments.content: This line declares and initializes a variable 'message' of type String with the value 'Hello World!'.
The variable 'message' is necessary to store the message that will be printed to the console.
This line directly contributes to the program objective of printing 'Hello World!' to the console.
This line uses the 'System.out.println()' method to print the value of the 'message' variable to the console.
The 'println()' method is a built-in method in the 'System.out' class that prints the given message followed by a new line.
By passing the 'message' variable as an argument to 'println()', it ensures that the message 'Hello World!' is printed to the console.
This line directly contributes to the program objective of printing 'Hello World!' to the console.

name: Challenge: Hello World!
